---------------------------------------

Fortix 2 is best described as a reverse turret
defense game. As Sir Fortix, the knight, you must
conquer castles while dodging tower turrets and
evil monsters. Fight your way across the shires of
 the island Artalom, storming from castle to castle.
Use cunning strategy to succeed against the
maze-like levels and defeat the evil mage Xitrof.
You are the lone Knight who must fight against the
entire infested continent!

------------------------------------------

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir 
4- Go To Hell!
